 30/// redim_get and redim_put are helper functions for Redim_block
 31/// They allow a single Redim_block class definition to reduce both
 32/// 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional blocks.
 33template <typename BlockT>
 34typename BlockT::value_type
 35redim_get(BlockT const& blk, index_type l_idx, Int_type<2>)
 36{
 37  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
 38
 39  dimension_type dim[2];
 40  index_type     idx[2];
 41  dim[0] = order_type::impl_dim0;
 42  dim[1] = order_type::impl_dim1;
 43
 44  for (dimension_type d=2; d-->0;)
 45  {
 46    idx[dim[d]] = l_idx % blk.size(2, dim[d]);
 47    l_idx /= blk.size(2, dim[d]);
 48  }
 49
 50  return blk.get(idx[0], idx[1]);
 51}
 52
 53template <typename BlockT>
 54void
 55redim_put(BlockT &blk,
 56	  index_type l_idx,
 57	  typename BlockT::value_type value,
 58	  Int_type<2>)
 59{
 60  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
 61
 62  dimension_type dim[2];
 63  index_type     idx[2];
 64  dim[0] = order_type::impl_dim0;
 65  dim[1] = order_type::impl_dim1;
 66
 67  for (dimension_type d=2; d-->0;)
 68  {
 69    idx[dim[d]] = l_idx % blk.size(2, dim[d]);
 70    l_idx /= blk.size(2, dim[d]);
 71  }
 72
 73  blk.put(idx[0], idx[1], value);
 74}
 75
 76
 77
 78template <typename BlockT>
 79typename BlockT::value_type
 80redim_get(BlockT const& blk, index_type l_idx, Int_type<3>)
 81{
 82  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
 83
 84  dimension_type dim[3];
 85  index_type     idx[3];
 86  dim[0] = order_type::impl_dim0;
 87  dim[1] = order_type::impl_dim1;
 88  dim[2] = order_type::impl_dim2;
 89
 90  for (dimension_type d=3; d-->0;)
 91  {
 92    idx[dim[d]] = l_idx % blk.size(3, dim[d]);
 93    l_idx /= blk.size(3, dim[d]);
 94  }
 95
 96  return blk.get(idx[0], idx[1], idx[2]);
 97}
 98
 99
100
101template <typename BlockT>
102void
103redim_put(BlockT &blk,
104	  index_type l_idx,
105	  typename BlockT::value_type value,
106	  Int_type<3>)
107{
108  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
109
110  dimension_type dim[3];
111  index_type     idx[3];
112  dim[0] = order_type::impl_dim0;
113  dim[1] = order_type::impl_dim1;
114  dim[2] = order_type::impl_dim2;
115
116  for (dimension_type d=3; d-->0;)
117  {
118    idx[dim[d]] = l_idx % blk.size(3, dim[d]);
119    l_idx /= blk.size(3, dim[d]);
120  }
121
122  blk.put(idx[0], idx[1], idx[2], value);
123}
124
125
126/// Redimension block.
127///
128/// Provides a 1-dimensional view of a multidimensional block.
129/// Intended for use when a multidimensional block refers to dense
130/// data, but does not support 1,x-dimensional access (for example
131/// a Sliced_block).  Redim_block's direct data interface requires
132/// underlying block to be dense, but get/put work regardless of the
133/// layout.
134template <typename       BlockT,
135	  dimension_type OrigDim>
136class Redim_block
137  : Compile_time_assert<OrigDim == 2 || OrigDim == 3>
138{
139  // Compile-time values and typedefs.
140public:
141  static dimension_type const dim = 1;
142
143  typedef typename BlockT::value_type           value_type;
144  typedef typename BlockT::reference_type       reference_type;
145  typedef typename BlockT::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
146  typedef typename BlockT::map_type             map_type;
147
148  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type raw_order_type;
149
150  // Constructors
151public:
152  Redim_block(BlockT& block)
153    : blk_(&block)
154  {}
155
156  Redim_block(Redim_block const& rb) VSIP_NOTHROW
157    : blk_(&*rb.blk_)
158  {}
159
160  ~Redim_block() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
161
162  // Accessors
163public:
164  value_type get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW
165  {
166    return redim_get(*blk_, idx, Int_type<OrigDim>());
167  }
168
169  void put(index_type idx, value_type val) const VSIP_NOTHROW
170  {
171    redim_put(*blk_, idx, val, Int_type<OrigDim>());
172  }
173
174  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
175  { return blk_->size(); }
176
177  length_type size(dimension_type D, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
178  {
179    assert(D == 1 && d == 0);
180    return blk_->size();
181  }
182
183  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW
184  { return blk_->map_; }
185
186
187  // Reference-counting (nop since Redim_block is held by-value).
188public:
189  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
190  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
191
192
193  // Support Direct_data interface.
194public:
195  typedef Storage<typename Block_layout<BlockT>::complex_type, value_type>
196		storage_type;
197  typedef typename storage_type::type       data_type;
198  typedef typename storage_type::const_type const_data_type;
199
200  data_type       impl_data()       VSIP_NOTHROW
201  { return blk_->impl_data(); }
202
203  const_data_type impl_data() const VSIP_NOTHROW
204  { return blk_->impl_data(); }
205
206  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type total_dim, dimension_type d)
207     const VSIP_NOTHROW
208  {
209    // Force 1-dimensional access.  This should only be forced
210    // when it makes sense of course.
211
212    assert(total_dim == 1 && d == 0);
213    return OrigDim == 2 ? blk_->impl_stride(2, raw_order_type::impl_dim1)
214                        : blk_->impl_stride(3, raw_order_type::impl_dim2);
215  }
216
217
218  // Member data.
219private:
220  typename View_block_storage<BlockT>::type blk_;
221};
222
223
224
225template <typename       BlockT,
226	  dimension_type Dim>
227struct Block_layout<Redim_block<BlockT, Dim> >
228{
229  // Dimension: 1
230  // Access   : Same
231  // Order    : row1_type
232  // Stride   : Stride_unit if parent Stride_unit*
233  //            Stride_unknown otherwise
234  // Cmplx    : Same
235
236public:
237  static dimension_type const dim = 1;
238
239  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::access_type access_type;
240  typedef row1_type                                 order_type;
241  typedef typename ITE_Type<
242    Block_layout<BlockT>::pack_type::is_ct_unit_stride,
243    As_type<Stride_unit>, As_type<Stride_unknown> >::type pack_type;
244  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::complex_type complex_type;
245
246  typedef Layout<dim, order_type, pack_type, complex_type> layout_type;
247};
248
249// Store Redim_block by-value.
250template <typename BlockT, dimension_type Dim>
251struct View_block_storage<Redim_block<BlockT, Dim> >
252  : By_value_block_storage<Redim_block<BlockT, Dim> >
253{};
254
255
256
257/// Expression reduction to determine if an expression consists of
258/// dense data at the leaves (either blocks with stride_unit_dense 
259/// packing, subviews that are dense, or scalar_blocks).  Check is
260/// done at runtime, checking for gaps in highest-dimension stride.
261struct Reduce_is_expr_dense
262{
263  template <dimension_type            Dim0,
264	    typename                  T>
265  bool
266  apply(expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> const&)
267  {
268    return true;
269  }
270
271  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
272  bool
273  apply(expr::Unary<O, B, true> const &b) { return apply(b.arg());}
274
275  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
276	    typename LBlock,
277	    typename RBlock>
278  bool
279  apply(expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const& blk)
280  {
281    return apply(blk.arg1()) && apply(blk.arg2());
282  }
283
284  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
285	    typename Block1,
286	    typename Block2,
287	    typename Block3>
288  bool
289  apply(expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const& blk)
290  {
291    return apply(blk.arg1()) && apply(blk.arg2()) && apply(blk.arg3());
292  }
293
294  // Leaf combine function.
295  template <typename BlockT>
296  bool
297  apply(BlockT const&, Bool_type<false>) const
298  {
299    return false;
300  }
301
302  // Leaf combine function.
303  template <typename BlockT>
304  bool
305  apply(BlockT const& block, Bool_type<true>) const
306  {
307    typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
308
309    Ext_data<BlockT> ext(block, SYNC_IN);
310
311    if (Block_layout<BlockT>::dim == 1)
312      return ext.stride(0) == 1;
313    else if (Block_layout<BlockT>::dim == 2)
314      return (ext.stride(order_type::impl_dim0) ==
315	      static_cast<stride_type>(ext.size(order_type::impl_dim1)))
316	     && ext.stride(order_type::impl_dim1) == 1;
317    else if (Block_layout<BlockT>::dim == 3)
318      return (ext.stride(order_type::impl_dim0) ==
319	      static_cast<stride_type>(ext.size(order_type::impl_dim1) *
320				       ext.size(order_type::impl_dim2)))
321             && ext.stride(order_type::impl_dim2) == 1;
322    else return false;
323  }
324
325  // Leaf combine function.
326  template <typename BlockT>
327  bool
328  apply(BlockT const& block) const
329  {
330    return apply(block, Bool_type<Ext_data_cost<BlockT>::value == 0>());
331  }
332};
333
334/// Helper function to apply Reduce_is_expr_dense reduction.
335template <typename BlockT>
336bool
337is_expr_dense(BlockT& blk)
338{
339  Reduce_is_expr_dense obj;
340  return obj.apply(blk);
341}
342
343
344
345/// Reduction to redimension an expression from x-dimensional (where x > 1)
346/// to 1-dimensional.
347///
348/// Transform expression block dimensions to 1, keeps dense blocks
349/// (which are 1,x-dimensional) as is, wraps other blocks with Redim_block.
350template <dimension_type NewDim>
351class Redim_expr
352{
353public:
354  template <typename BlockT>
355  struct leaf_node
356  {
357    typedef Redim_block<BlockT, Block_layout<BlockT>::dim> type;
358  };
359
360  template <dimension_type Dim0,
361	    typename       T,
362	    typename       OrderT,
363	    typename       MapT>
364  struct leaf_node<Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT> >
365  {
366    typedef Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT> type;
367  };
368
369  template <dimension_type Dim0,
370	    typename       T,
371	    typename       OrderT>
372  struct leaf_node<Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_or_global_map<Dim0> > >
373  {
374    typedef Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_map> type;
375  };
376
377  template <dimension_type Dim0,
378	    typename       T>
379  struct leaf_node<expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> >
380  {
381    typedef expr::Scalar<NewDim, T> type;
382  };
383
384  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
385  struct unary_node
386  {
387    typedef expr::Unary<O, B, true> const type;
388  };
389
390  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
391	    typename LBlock,
392	    typename RBlock>
393  struct binary_node
394  {
395    typedef expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const type;
396  };
397
398  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
399	    typename Block1,
400	    typename Block2,
401	    typename Block3>
402  struct ternary_node
403  {
404    typedef expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const type;
405  };
406
407  template <typename BlockT>
408  struct transform
409  {
410    typedef typename leaf_node<BlockT>::type type;
411  };
412
413  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
414  struct transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
415  {
416    typedef typename unary_node<O, typename transform<B>::type>::type
417    type;
418  };
419
420  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
421	    typename LBlock,
422	    typename RBlock>
423  struct transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>
424  {
425    typedef typename binary_node<Operation,
426				 typename transform<LBlock>::type,
427				 typename transform<RBlock>::type>
428    ::type type;
429  };
430
431  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
432	    typename Block1,
433	    typename Block2,
434	    typename Block3>
435  struct transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>
436  {
437    typedef typename ternary_node<Operation,
438				  typename transform<Block1>::type,
439				  typename transform<Block2>::type,
440				  typename transform<Block3>::type>
441    ::type type;
442  };
443
444
445  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
446  typename transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>::type
447  apply(expr::Unary<O, B, true> const &b)
448  {
449    typedef typename transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>::type
450      block_type;
451    return block_type(b.operation(), apply(const_cast<B&>(b.arg())));
452  }
453
454  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
455	    typename LBlock,
456	    typename RBlock>
457  typename transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>::type
458  apply(expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const& blk)
459  {
460    typedef typename
461      transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>::type
462        block_type;
463    return block_type(apply(const_cast<LBlock&>(blk.arg1())),
464		      apply(const_cast<RBlock&>(blk.arg2())));
465  }
466
467  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
468	    typename Block1,
469	    typename Block2,
470	    typename Block3>
471  typename transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>::type
472  apply(expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const& blk)
473  {
474    typedef typename
475      transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>::type
476        block_type;
477    return block_type(apply(const_cast<Block1&>(blk.arg1())),
478		      apply(const_cast<Block2&>(blk.arg2())),
479		      apply(const_cast<Block3&>(blk.arg3())));
480  }
481
482  // Leaf combine function for Dense.
483  template <dimension_type Dim0,
484	    typename       T,
485	    typename       OrderT,
486	    typename       MapT>
487  // typename transform<Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT> >::type&
488  Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT>&
489  apply(Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, MapT>& block) const
490  {
491    return block;
492  }
493
494  template <dimension_type Dim0,
495	    typename       T,
496	    typename       OrderT>
497  // typename transform<Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_or_global_map<Dim0> > >::type&
498  Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_map>&
499  apply(Dense<Dim0, T, OrderT, Local_or_global_map<Dim0> >& block) const
500  {
501    return block.get_local_block();
502  }
503
504  // Leaf combine function for expr::Scalar.
505  template <dimension_type Dim0,
506	    typename       T>
507  typename transform<expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> >::type
508  apply(expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> & block) const
509  {
510    return expr::Scalar<NewDim, T>(block.value());
511  }
512
513
514  // Leaf combine function.
515  template <typename BlockT>
516  typename transform<BlockT>::type
517  apply(BlockT& block) const
518  {
519    typedef typename transform<BlockT>::type block_type;
520    return block_type(block);
521  }
522
523  // Constructors.
524public:
525  Redim_expr() {}
526};
527
528
529
530/// Reduction to check if all leaf blocks have dimension-ordering
531/// equivalent to OrderT.
532template <typename OrderT>
533struct Reduce_is_same_dim_order
534{
535public:
536  template <typename BlockT>
537  struct leaf_node
538  {
539    typedef Bool_type<Type_equal<typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type,
540				 OrderT>::value> type;
541  };
542
543  template <dimension_type Dim0,
544	    typename       T>
545  struct leaf_node<expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> >
546  {
547    typedef Bool_type<true> type;
548  };
549
550  template <template <typename> class Operation,
551	    typename Block>
552  struct unary_node
553  {
554    typedef Block type;
555  };
556
557  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
558	    typename LBlock,
559	    typename RBlock>
560  struct binary_node
561  {
562    typedef Bool_type<LBlock::value && RBlock::value> type;
563  };
564
565  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
566	    typename Block1,
567	    typename Block2,
568	    typename Block3>
569  struct ternary_node
570  {
571    typedef Bool_type<Block1::value && Block2::value && Block3::value> type;
572  };
573
574  template <typename Block>
575  struct transform
576  {
577    typedef typename leaf_node<Block>::type type;
578  };
579
580  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
581  struct transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
582  {
583    typedef typename unary_node<O, typename transform<B>::type>::type
584    type;
585  };
586
587  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
588	    typename LBlock,
589	    typename RBlock>
590  struct transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>
591  {
592    typedef typename binary_node<Operation,
593				 typename transform<LBlock>::type,
594				 typename transform<RBlock>::type>
595    ::type type;
596  };
597
598  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
599	    typename Block1,
600	    typename Block2,
601	    typename Block3>
602  struct transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>
603  {
604    typedef typename ternary_node<Operation,
605				  typename transform<Block1>::type,
606				  typename transform<Block2>::type,
607				  typename transform<Block3>::type>
608    ::type type;
609  };
610};
611
612
613template <typename OrderT,
614	  typename BlockT>
615struct Is_same_dim_order
616{
617  static bool const value =
618    Reduce_is_same_dim_order<OrderT>::template transform<BlockT>::type::value;
619};
620
621
622
623/// Reduction to determine if all leaf blocks of an expression support
624/// direct access (cost == 0).
625struct Reduce_is_expr_direct_access
626{
627public:
628  template <typename BlockT>
629  struct leaf_node
630  {
631    typedef Bool_type<Ext_data_cost<BlockT>::value == 0> type;
632  };
633
634  template <dimension_type Dim0,
635	    typename       T>
636  struct leaf_node<expr::Scalar<Dim0, T> >
637  {
638    typedef Bool_type<true> type;
639  };
640
641  template <template <typename> class Operation,
642	    typename Block>
643  struct unary_node
644  {
645    typedef Block type;
646  };
647
648  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
649	    typename LBlock,
650	    typename RBlock>
651  struct binary_node
652  {
653    typedef Bool_type<LBlock::value && RBlock::value> type;
654  };
655
656  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
657	    typename Block1,
658	    typename Block2,
659	    typename Block3>
660  struct ternary_node
661  {
662    typedef Bool_type<Block1::value && Block2::value && Block3::value> type;
663  };
664
665  template <typename Block>
666  struct transform
667  {
668    typedef typename leaf_node<Block>::type type;
669  };
670
671  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
672  struct transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
673  {
674    typedef typename unary_node<O, typename transform<B>::type>::type
675    type;
676  };
677
678  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
679	    typename LBlock,
680	    typename RBlock>
681  struct transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>
682  {
683    typedef typename binary_node<Operation,
684				 typename transform<LBlock>::type,
685				 typename transform<RBlock>::type>
686    ::type type;
687  };
688
689  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
690	    typename Block1,
691	    typename Block2,
692	    typename Block3>
693  struct transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>
694  {
695    typedef typename ternary_node<Operation,
696				  typename transform<Block1>::type,
697				  typename transform<Block2>::type,
698				  typename transform<Block3>::type>
699				::type type;
700  };
701};
702
703
704template <typename BlockT>
705struct Is_expr_direct_access
706{
707  static bool const value =
708    Reduce_is_expr_direct_access::template transform<BlockT>::type::value;
709};

711} // namespace vsip::impl

714namespace vsip_csl
715{
716namespace dispatcher
717{
718
719/// Evaluator to convert dense multi-dimensional expressions into
720/// 1 dimensional expressions.
721template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS>
722struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::dense_expr, void(LHS &, RHS const &)>
723{
724  static char const *name() { return "be::dense_expr";}
725
726  static bool const ct_valid =
727    D > 1 &&
728    impl::Ext_data_cost<LHS>::value == 0 &&
729    impl::Is_expr_direct_access<RHS>::value &&
730    impl::Is_same_dim_order<typename impl::Block_layout<LHS>::order_type,
731			    RHS>::value;
732
733  static bool rt_valid(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
734  { return impl::is_expr_dense(lhs) && impl::is_expr_dense(rhs);}
735
736  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
737  {
738    using impl::Redim_expr;
739    typedef typename Redim_expr<1>::template transform<RHS>::type
740      new_rhs_type;
741    typedef typename Redim_expr<1>::template transform<LHS>::type
742      new_lhs_type;
743
744    Redim_expr<1> redim;
745
746    // Create an lvalue that dispatch() below can write into.
747    typename impl::View_block_storage<new_lhs_type>::plain_type
748      new_lhs = redim.apply(const_cast<LHS&>(lhs));
749
750    vsip_csl::dispatch<op::assign<1>, void, new_lhs_type &, new_rhs_type const &>
751      (new_lhs, redim.apply(const_cast<RHS&>(rhs)));
752  }
753};
754
755} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
756} // namespace vsip_csl
757
758#endif

synopsis (version 0.12)
